tiles.title: IBM Power Virtual Server Private Cloud General Availability
tiles.description: Power Virtual Server Private Cloud, an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) offering, is now available. It extends the capabilities and benefits of Power Virtual Server within your data center, with a prescriptive set of hardware and delivered in a consumption model with no upfront payment.
